__data__.text:
Hypertension (High Blood Pressure)
Symptoms: Headaches, dizziness, blurred vision, chest pain, fatigue.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Modifications: Reduce intake of salty and processed foods. Include fresh fruits, vegetables, and whole grains.
Stress Management: Practice relaxation techniques like Pranayama (breathing exercises) and meditation.
Herbs: Arjuna and Ashwagandha are commonly used to support heart health.
Lifestyle: Regular physical activity and maintaining a healthy weight are essential.
Diabetes Mellitus
Symptoms: Increased thirst, frequent urination, fatigue, weight loss, blurred vision.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Diet Control: Emphasize a low glycemic index diet with foods like bitter gourd, fenugreek, and turmeric.
Physical Activity: Regular exercise, particularly Yoga, can help manage blood sugar levels.
Herbs: Bitter Gourd, Turmeric, and Gymnema Sylvestre are commonly used herbs.
Stress Reduction: Stress management techniques like meditation and deep breathing.
Asthma
Symptoms: Wheezing, shortness of breath, coughing, chest tightness.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Breathing Exercises (Pranayama): Improve lung capacity and reduce inflammation.
Herbs: Vasaka, Licorice, and Tulsi can help reduce asthma symptoms.
Dietary Changes: Avoid cold, heavy foods and dairy. Include warm, easily digestible meals.
Arthritis
Symptoms: Joint pain, swelling, stiffness, reduced mobility.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Panchakarma Therapies: Detoxification treatments like Virechana and Basti.
Herbs: Guggul, Shallaki, and Ashwagandha can help reduce inflammation and pain.
Dietary Modifications: Include anti-inflammatory foods like turmeric, ginger, and leafy greens.
Migraine
Symptoms: Severe headaches, nausea, vomiting, sensitivity to light and sound.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Stress Management: Regular meditation and relaxation techniques.
Herbs: Brahmi and Peppermint can help relieve migraine symptoms.
Dietary Changes: Avoid trigger foods like processed meats, caffeine, and aged cheese.
Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
Symptoms: Abdominal pain, bloating, diarrhea or constipation.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Changes: Include easily digestible foods, cooked vegetables, and herbal teas.
Herbs: Aloe Vera, Triphala, and Licorice can help soothe the digestive system.
Stress Reduction: Stress management techniques like Yoga and meditation.
Depression
Symptoms: Persistent sadness, loss of interest, fatigue, changes in sleep and appetite.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Yoga and Meditation: Regular practice for mental and emotional balance.
Herbs: St. John's Wort, Brahmi, and Ashwagandha can help improve mood.
Dietary Support: Include nourishing foods like leafy greens and nuts.
Chronic Bronchitis
Symptoms: Cough with mucus, shortness of breath, chest discomfort.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Decoctions: Use herbs like Vasaka and Kantakari to ease respiratory symptoms.
Steam Inhalation: Inhaling steam with beneficial herbs can provide relief.
Dietary Recommendations: Avoid cold and dairy products. Consume warm, easily digestible foods.
Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
Symptoms: Heartburn, acid regurgitation, chest pain, difficulty swallowing.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Modifications: Avoid spicy, greasy, and acidic foods. Include Amla and Licorice in your

greasy, and acidic foods. Include Amla and Licorice in your diet.
Herbs: Licorice and Amla can help soothe the digestive tract.
Lifestyle: Maintain an upright posture after meals. Practice relaxation techniques to reduce stress.
Osteoporosis
Symptoms: Bone pain, fractures, loss of height, stooped posture.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Calcium-Rich Diet: Consume foods rich in calcium like dairy, sesame seeds, and leafy greens.
Weight-Bearing Exercises: Yoga, walking, and light weightlifting can strengthen bones.
Herbs: Ashwagandha and Shatavari can support bone health.
Hypothyroidism
Symptoms: Fatigue, weight gain, cold intolerance, depression, hair loss.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Remedies: Herbs like Guggul and Kanchanar may support thyroid function.
Dietary Adjustments: Include iodine-rich foods like seaweed and avoid processed foods.
Lifestyle: Practice stress-reduction techniques like meditation and Pranayama.
Allergies
Symptoms: Sneezing, runny nose, itchy eyes, skin rashes.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Allergen Avoidance: Identify and avoid allergens.
Herbs: Turmeric, Neem, and Triphala can help reduce allergy symptoms.
Dietary Support: Consume anti-inflammatory foods and herbal teas.
Chronic Kidney Disease
Symptoms: Fatigue, swelling in legs, blood in urine, elevated blood pressure.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Kidney Tonics: Punarnava and Gokshura are commonly used to support kidney function.
Dietary Changes: Limit protein, sodium, and potassium intake as per individual needs.
Lifestyle Modifications: Stay hydrated and maintain healthy blood pressure.
Gallstones
Symptoms: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, jaundice.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Modifications: Limit fatty and fried foods. Consume herbs like Turmeric and Dandelion.
Herbs and Supplements: Herbal formulations like Liv.52 may help support liver function.
Panchakarma: Depending on the condition's severity, therapies like Basti (enema) may be considered.
Anxiety Disorders
Symptoms: Excessive worry, restlessness, muscle tension, panic attacks.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Meditation and Relaxation: Practice meditation, Pranayama, and Shirodhara for anxiety relief.
Herbs: Ashwagandha, Brahmi, and Jatamansi are known for their calming effects.
Dietary Support: Avoid stimulants like caffeine and prioritize a calming diet.
Obesity
Symptoms: Excessive body weight, fatigue, joint pain.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Balanced Diet: Follow a well-balanced diet with portion control.
Regular Exercise: Incorporate daily physical activity, including Yoga and brisk walking.
Herbs: Guggul, Triphala, and Garcinia Cambogia may aid in weight management.
Eczema
Symptoms: Itchy, inflamed skin, rash, redness.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Creams: Topical applications of Neem and Manjistha-based creams.
Dietary Adjustments: Identify and avoid trigger foods.
Lifestyle: Stress reduction techniques, like meditation, to manage flare-ups.
Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS)
Symptoms: Severe fatigue, muscle pain, sleep disturbances.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Rest and Relaxation: Prioritize rest and sleep. Avoid overexertion.
Stress Management: Meditation, Shirodhara, and gentle Yoga.
Herbs: Ashwagandha, Shatavari, and Brahmi can support energy levels.
Rheumatoid Arthritis
Symptoms:

and Brahmi can support energy levels.
Rheumatoid Arthritis
Symptoms: Joint pain, stiffness, swelling, fatigue.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Panchakarma: Detoxification therapies like Virechana may be recommended.
Herbs: Guggul, Turmeric, and Shallaki can help manage inflammation.
Dietary Modifications: Avoid inflammatory foods and include ginger, garlic, and fenugreek.
Cataracts
Symptoms: Blurred vision, glare, difficulty seeing at night.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Eye Exercises: Practice eye exercises to improve vision.
Herbal Eye Drops: Use Triphala or Saffron-infused drops.
Dietary Support: Consume foods rich in antioxidants like carrots and spinach.

Pneumonia
Symptoms: High fever, cough with mucus, chest pain, difficulty breathing.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Remedies: Herbs like Tulsi and Adhatoda may help ease respiratory symptoms.
Steam Inhalation: Inhaling steam with beneficial herbs can provide relief.
Dietary Support: Consume warm, easy-to-digest foods and herbal teas.
Osteoarthritis
Symptoms: Joint pain, stiffness, decreased range of motion.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Panchakarma Therapies: Detoxification treatments like Abhyanga (oil massage) and Janu Basti.
Herbs: Boswellia, Guggul, and Turmeric can help reduce inflammation.
Dietary Recommendations: Include anti-inflammatory foods and avoid processed, refined foods.
Celiac Disease
Symptoms: Digestive issues, diarrhea, weight loss, skin rashes.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Gluten-free Diet: Eliminate gluten-containing grains and emphasize rice, millet, and quinoa.
Digestive Herbs: Aloe Vera and Ginger can help soothe the digestive system.
Ghee: Incorporate clarified butter (ghee) into the diet for digestive support.
Parkinson's Disease
Symptoms: Tremors, bradykinesia (slowness of movement), muscle rigidity.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Mucuna Pruriens (Kapikacchu): This herb contains L-dopa and is used to manage symptoms.
Panchakarma: Detoxification therapies like Virechana may be recommended.
Rasayana Herbs: Ashwagandha and Brahmi can support neurological health.
Epilepsy
Symptoms: Seizures, loss of consciousness, convulsions.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Lifestyle Management: Maintain a regular routine, get adequate sleep, and practice stress reduction techniques.
Herbs: Brahmi and Shankhpushpi are used to support neurological health.
Nasya Therapy: Administering medicated oils or herbal preparations through the nasal passage may be recommended.
Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
Symptoms: Chronic cough, shortness of breath, chest tightness.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Breathing Exercises: Pranayama and deep breathing exercises to improve lung function.
Herbs: Vasaka and Kantakari can help reduce symptoms.
Dietary Changes: Avoid cold and dairy products. Consume warm, easily digestible foods.
Hepatitis
Symptoms: Jaundice, fatigue, abdominal pain, dark urine.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Liver-Supporting Herbs: Kutki and Bhringaraj are commonly used to support liver function.
Dietary Changes: Avoid alcohol and processed foods. Consume a light, balanced diet.
Lifestyle: Rest and stress reduction are important during recovery.
Endometriosis
Symptoms: Pelvic pain, heavy menstrual bleeding, infertility.

Ayurvedic

pain, heavy menstrual bleeding, infertility.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Treatments: Ashoka and Shatavari are used to manage symptoms.
Dietary Changes: Avoid dairy and processed foods. Emphasize a plant-based diet.
Stress Reduction: Practice Yoga and meditation for pain management.
Gout
Symptoms: Severe joint pain, swelling, redness, limited joint mobility.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Diet Control: Limit purine-rich foods like red meat and alcohol. Consume herbs like Guggul and Shallaki.
Herbs: Guduchi and Aloe Vera can help reduce inflammation.
Hydration: Maintain proper hydration to support kidney function.
Ulcerative Colitis
Symptoms: Abdominal pain, bloody diarrhea, weight loss, fatigue.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Remedies: Kutaj and Bilva are commonly used to manage symptoms.
Dietary Modifications: Avoid spicy and processed foods. Consume easily digestible meals.
Stress Management: Stress reduction techniques like meditation are crucial.
Fibromyalgia
Symptoms: Widespread muscle pain, fatigue, sleep disturbances.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Gentle Exercises: Engage in gentle Yoga and regular, low-impact physical activity.
Stress Management: Meditation, Shirodhara, and Ayurvedic massages.
Herbs: Ashwagandha, Guggul, and Triphala may offer symptom relief.
Autism Spectrum Disorder
Symptoms: Social and communication difficulties, repetitive behaviors.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Behavioral Therapies: Individualized approaches to address specific needs.
Herbal Supplements: Brahmi and Shankhpushpi may be used to support cognitive health.
Sensory Therapies: Ayurvedic approaches to sensory sensitivities.
Crohn's Disease
Symptoms: Abdominal pain, diarrhea, weight loss, fatigue.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Treatments: Aloe Vera and Kutki are used to manage digestive symptoms.
Dietary Changes: Avoid processed and spicy foods. Consume easy-to-digest meals.
Lifestyle Modifications: Practice stress reduction techniques like meditation.
Multiple Sclerosis
Symptoms: Fatigue, numbness, muscle weakness, balance problems.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Remedies: Ashwagandha, Guggul, and Brahmi may support neurological health.
Dietary Modifications: Emphasize anti-inflammatory foods like turmeric and ginger.
Lifestyle: Stress management techniques like Pranayama.
Hemorrhoids (Piles)
Symptoms: Rectal bleeding, itching, pain during bowel movements.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Modifications: Include high-fiber foods like psyllium and avoid spicy, oily foods.
Herbal Ointments: Triphala-based ointments and Arshoghna oils for topical relief.
Hydration: Drink plenty of water to soften stools and ease bowel movements.
Thyroid Disorders
Symptoms: Weight changes, fatigue, mood swings, changes in heart rate.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Diet Control: Include iodine-rich foods like seaweed and reduce processed foods.
Stress Management: Meditation, Pranayama, and Ashwagandha for hormone balance.
Herbs: Guggul, Kanchanar, and Brahmi may support thyroid function.
Ovarian Cysts
Symptoms: Pelvic pain, irregular menstrual cycles, bloating.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Remedies: Shatavari and Ashoka are used to manage hormonal imbalances.
Dietary Changes: Consume a balanced diet with anti-inflammatory foods.
Stress Reduction: Practice Yoga and meditation for overall

foods.
Stress Reduction: Practice Yoga and meditation for overall well-being.
Gastritis
Symptoms: Stomach pain, bloating, nausea, indigestion.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Modifications: Avoid spicy, acidic, and fried foods. Consume Amla and Licorice.
Herbs: Amla and Coriander can help soothe the digestive tract.
Lifestyle: Eat mindfully and avoid overeating. Practice stress reduction techniques.
Bipolar Disorder
Symptoms: Mood swings, manic episodes, depression, impulsivity.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Yoga and Meditation: Regular practice for mood stabilization.
Herbs: Brahmi, Jatamansi, and Ashwagandha may support emotional balance.
Dietary Support: Include Omega-3 fatty acids and complex carbohydrates.
Pancreatitis
Symptoms: Abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, fever.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Modifications: Fasting or consuming a liquid diet for a short period to reduce pancreatic strain.
Herbs and Supplements: Kutki and Guduchi can be used after consulting an Ayurvedic practitioner.
Ayurvedic Formulations: Medicines like Avipattikar Churna and Triphala may help in symptom management.
Abhyanga (Oil Massage): Regular gentle massage with warm sesame oil can provide relaxation and support overall well-being.
Stress Management: Stress reduction techniques like meditation and Yoga can be beneficial.

Symptoms: Excessive body weight, fatigue, joint pain.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Balanced Diet: Follow a well-balanced diet with portion control.
Regular Exercise: Incorporate daily physical activity, including Yoga and brisk walking.
Herbs: Guggul,

daily physical activity, including Yoga and brisk walking.
Herbs: Guggul, Triphala, and Garcinia Cambogia may aid in weight management.
Eczema
Symptoms: Itchy, inflamed skin, rash, redness.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Creams: Topical applications of Neem and Manjistha-based creams.
Dietary Adjustments: Identify and avoid trigger foods.
Lifestyle: Stress reduction techniques, like meditation, to manage flare-ups.
Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS)
Symptoms: Severe fatigue, muscle pain, sleep disturbances.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Rest and Relaxation: Prioritize rest and sleep. Avoid overexertion.
Stress Management: Meditation, Shirodhara, and herbs like Ashwagandha and Shatavari.
Herbs: Ashwagandha, Shatavari, and Brahmi can support energy levels.
Autoimmune Diseases (e.g., Rheumatoid Arthritis, Lupus)
Symptoms: Joint pain, fatigue, inflammation, skin rashes (varies by condition).

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Panchakarma Therapies: Detoxification treatments like Virechana and Basti.
Herbs: Guggul, Ashwagandha, and Turmeric for immune modulation.
Dietary Modifications: Include anti-inflammatory foods like ginger and green tea.
Insomnia
Symptoms: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep, daytime fatigue.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Sleep Hygiene: Establish a regular sleep schedule and bedtime routine.
Herbs: Herbs like Brahmi, Ashwagandha, and Jatamansi for sleep support.
Stress Reduction: Meditation, Shirodhara, and calming herbal teas.
Urinary Tract Infections (UTIs)
Symptoms: Frequent urination, burning sensation, cloudy or bloody urine.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Hydration: Drink plenty of water to flush out toxins.
Herbs: Cranberry and Gokshura are used to support urinary health.
Dietary Recommendations: Avoid spicy and irritating foods.
Psoriasis
Symptoms: Red, scaly patches on the skin, itching, pain.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Ointments: Topical applications of Neem and Manjistha-based creams.
Dietary Adjustments: Identify and avoid trigger foods.
Lifestyle: Stress reduction techniques, like meditation, to manage flare-ups.
Endometriosis
Symptoms: Pelvic pain, heavy menstrual bleeding, infertility.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbal Treatments: Ashoka and Shatavari are used to manage symptoms.
Dietary Changes: Avoid dairy and processed foods. Emphasize a plant-based diet.
Stress Reduction: Practice Yoga and meditation for pain management.
Glaucoma
Symptoms: Gradual loss of peripheral vision, eye pain, blurred vision.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Herbs: Triphala and Bilberry may support eye health.
Eye Exercises: Practice eye exercises to improve blood circulation to the eyes.
Dietary Support: Consume foods rich in antioxidants like carrots and spinach.
Anemia
Symptoms: Fatigue, weakness, pale skin, shortness of breath.

Ayurvedic Treatment:

Dietary Adjustments: Include iron-rich foods like spinach, beetroot, and fenugreek.
Herbs: Herbs like Punarnava and Amalaki may help improve hemoglobin levels.
Lifestyle: Ensure adequate rest and exercise for overall well-being.
